string.name: name
string.value: The Map is in One Piece

string.name: parent
string.value: In Search of the Book of Ancient
I got the #bMemory Powder#k from Corporal Easy. Now I need to get this to Alcaster.

I can't believe you collected all of them. I may see you in a different light now. You took down the same monster that even our general was hesitant of ... that's just incredible! Anyway a promise is a promise so here's the #b#t4031055##k I found during the operation.

I don't know what you're going to do with it, but it's a pretty important item so I suggest you handle it with care. If you screw it up and throw it away in an accident, it'll vanish without a trace, so be really careful with it. Well then, bye~

You found it ... you got a hold of #b#t4031055##k!! All right, now. I'll have to cast a special spell on it so please be quiet for a second. If I can't concentrate, there's a chance that these gathered items may disappear for good. Here we go...Haaaap!

I don't know what you're going to do with it, but it's a pretty important item so I suggest you handle it with care. If you screw it up and throw it away in an accident, it'll vanish without a trace, so be really careful with it. Well then, bye~

I'm studying all #b4 of the #t4031054##k that you got me. It doesn't matter if they aren't put together into a single piece! #b#p2030002##k of Alpha platoon must have found #b#t4031055##k while investigating something around the Orbis Tower. Can you get the item for me, please? Thank you!
